name: Chris McDermid
body:
### Welcome to my new GitHub Pages page.
Hi, my name is Chris. I am currently a Technical Lead at Suncorp but that hasn't stopped me from wearing all kinds of hats such as team leader, architect and technical BA. My team and I work in a fast paced environment which allows us to focus on creating value for our customer. This site is a work in progress and over the next few weeks, I will be updating it. Please stay tuned for some exciting content.

### Skills
* Java
* Javascript
* Agile methodologies
* Way too many to list - check out my LinkedIn

### Projects
* New Superannuation Portal for Suncorp - Angular and Restful services
* Life Insurance Platform for Advisers for Asteron Life

### Contact Me
Not just yet...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
